name: Mortyr 2: For Ever
description:
Mortyr 2: For Ever is an action-shooter game developed by Mirage Interactive. It was originally released in 2004. Redback Sales published the game. Mortyr 2: For Ever has a Metascore of 56, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Mortyr 2: For Ever on PC.
